=== Developing Autopilot ===
Autopilot is a tool for creating automated tests written in Python. Emulators for GTK+ and Ubuntu SDK have been written for them. The Ubuntu SDK emulator is maintained under the ''Ubuntu UI Toolkit''.

* '''<nowiki>[[http://launchpad.net/autopilot|Autopilot]]</nowiki>''' in Launchpad
* '''<nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/autopilot-gtk|Autopilot GTK+]]</nowiki>''' in Launchpad
* '''<nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/ubuntu-ui-toolkit|Ubuntu UI Toolkit]]</nowiki>''' in Launchpad

=== Developing the QA Trackers ===
The QA Trackers are used to gather all manual test results. The tracker base is a module for Drupal 7 and can be found under the ''Ubuntu QA Website'' branch.

* '''<nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/ubuntu-qa-website|Ubuntu QA Website]]</nowiki>''' in Launchpad
* <nowiki>[[Testing-ISO-DevEnv|Tutorial in setting up a development environment for the QA Trackers]]</nowiki>
